snippet.title: Wonderbook: Book of Potions - Game Play
snippet.description:
With exciting new writing from the imagination of J.K. Rowling, Book of Potions provides everything you need to learn how to brew famed and powerful potions from the Harry Potter™ stories.

Find out more about Book of Potions:
http://us.playstation.com/games/wonderbook-book-of-potions-ps3.html

Check out Wonderbook: Book of Spells, available now!
http://us.playstation.com/games/wonderbook-book-of-spells-ps3.html

Augmented Reality Book Technology ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Wonderbook is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Wonderbook™: Book of Spells ©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by SCEE London Studio.

HARRY POTTER characters‚ names and all related indicia and POTTERMORE and all related indicia are trademarks of and © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. WBIE LOGO‚ WB SHIELD: ™ & © Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.
